MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Canvas LockCanvas(class Android.Graphics.Rect inOutDirty) cil managed
abstract member LockCanvas : Android.Graphics.Rect -> Android.Graphics.Canvas override this.LockCanvas : Android.Graphics.Rect -> Android.Graphics.Canvas

Docs.param: A rectangle that represents the dirty region that the caller wants to redraw. This function may choose to expand the dirty rectangle if for example the surface has been resized or if the previous contents of the surface were not available. The caller must redraw the entire dirty region as represented by the contents of the inOutDirty rectangle upon return from this function. The caller may also pass null instead, in the case where the entire surface should be redrawn.
Docs.summary: Gets a Canvas for drawing into this surface.
Docs.returns: A canvas for drawing into the surface.

Docs.exception: If the inOutDirty rectangle is not valid.
